entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:45 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Windy. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 17. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 09:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
